text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/ig/smart-immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.I
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    DE31By-SexA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's sex values
    DE32By-Administrative AreaA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's administrative regions/ areas
    DE33By-Age groupA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's age groups
    DE34By-Dose numberA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's dose numbers for a specific vaccine
    DE35By-Vaccine typeA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's vaccine types
    DE36By-Vaccine manufacturerA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's vaccine manufacturers for a specific vaccine
    DE37By-Reaction manifestationA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's reaction manifestations for a specific vaccine
    DE39By-Type of reactionA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's type of reaction for a specific vaccine
    DE54By-Risk & occupational groupA disaggregation grouped by the indicator population's risk and occupational group

name: IMMZ_I_DE30
title: IMMZ.I.DE30 ValueSet for Disaggregation group
description: ValueSet for Disaggregation group for IMMZ.I.DE30
